org.openimaj.image.typography.hershey

Class HersheyFontStyle<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.typography.FontStyle<T>
      • org.openimaj.image.typography.hershey.HersheyFontStyle<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - pixel type of image

    public class HersheyFontStyle<T>
extends FontStyle<T>
    Style parameters for Hershey vector fonts.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • getActualWidthScale

        public float getActualWidthScale()
        Get the actual scale to render the font at. This is calculated by scaling to the fontSize and then applying the widthScale.
        Returns:
        the actual width scaling

        public float getActualHeightScale()
        Get the actual scale to render the font at. This is calculated by scaling to the fontSize and then applying the heightScale.

        the actual height scaling
